mapper.sql: EP.f_id,EP.f_src_id,EP.t_supply_merchant_f_id,EP.f_name,EP.f_name_mini,EP.f_is_pre_sell,EP.f_price,EP.f_price_discount,EP.f_purchase_price,EP.f_default_delivery_id,EP.f_left_count,date_format(EP.f_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_create_time,EP.f_sel_num,EP.f_pic_base,EP.f_pic_base_mini,EP.t_ebuy_product_type_f_id,EP.t_ebuy_product_type_for_enter_f_id,EP.t_ebuy_delivery_desc_id,EP.f_price_unit,EP.f_code,EP.f_erp_code,EP.f_specification,EP.f_desc,EP.f_status,EP.f_status_audit,date_format(EP.f_up_shelf_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_up_shelf_time,date_format(EP.f_down_shelf_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_down_shelf_time,EP.f_pic_special,EP.f_price_point,EP.f_price_discount_point,EP.f_point_type,EP.f_wlApp_type,EP.f_special_product_type,EP.f_application_rang,date_format(EP.f_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_end_time,EP.f_convert_process,EP.f_attention_info,EP.f_film_ticket_num,EP.t_source_of_supply_f_id,EP.f_is_hot_sale,date_format(EP.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_sys0_upd_time

EP.f_id as EPid,EP.f_src_id as EPsrcId,EP.t_supply_merchant_f_id as EPtSupplyMerchantFId,EP.f_name as EPname,EP.f_name_mini as EPnameMini,EP.f_is_pre_sell as EPisPreSell,EP.f_price as EPprice,EP.f_price_discount as EPpriceDiscount,EP.f_purchase_price as EPpurchasePrice,EP.f_default_delivery_id as EPdefaultDeliveryId,EP.f_left_count as EPleftCount,date_format(EP.f_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EPcreateTime,EP.f_sel_num as EPselNum,EP.f_pic_base as EPpicBase,EP.f_pic_base_mini as EPpicBaseMini,EP.t_ebuy_product_type_f_id as EPtEbuyProductTypeFId,EP.t_ebuy_product_type_for_enter_f_id as EPtEbuyProductTypeForEnterFId,EP.t_ebuy_delivery_desc_id as EPtEbuyDeliveryDescId,EP.f_price_unit as EPpriceUnit,EP.f_code as EPcode,EP.f_erp_code as EPerpCode,EP.f_specification as EPspecification,EP.f_desc as EPdesc,EP.f_status as EPstatus,EP.f_status_audit as EPstatusAudit,date_format(EP.f_up_shelf_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EPupShelfTime,date_format(EP.f_down_shelf_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EPdownShelfTime,EP.f_pic_special as EPpicSpecial,EP.f_price_point as EPpricePoint,EP.f_price_discount_point as EPpriceDiscountPoint,EP.f_point_type as EPpointType,EP.f_wlApp_type as EPwlappType,EP.f_special_product_type as EPspecialProductType,EP.f_application_rang as EPapplicationRang,date_format(EP.f_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EPendTime,EP.f_convert_process as EPconvertProcess,EP.f_attention_info as EPattentionInfo,EP.f_film_ticket_num as EPfilmTicketNum,EP.t_source_of_supply_f_id as EPtSourceOfSupplyFId,EP.f_is_hot_sale as EPisHotSale,date_format(EP.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EPsys0UpdTime

EP1.f_id as EP1id,EP1.f_src_id as EP1srcId,EP1.t_supply_merchant_f_id as EP1tSupplyMerchantFId,EP1.f_name as EP1name,EP1.f_name_mini as EP1nameMini,EP1.f_is_pre_sell as EP1isPreSell,EP1.f_price as EP1price,EP1.f_price_discount as EP1priceDiscount,EP1.f_purchase_price as EP1purchasePrice,EP1.f_default_delivery_id as EP1defaultDeliveryId,EP1.f_left_count as EP1leftCount,date_format(EP1.f_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EP1createTime,EP1.f_sel_num as EP1selNum,EP1.f_pic_base as EP1picBase,EP1.f_pic_base_mini as EP1picBaseMini,EP1.t_ebuy_product_type_f_id as EP1tEbuyProductTypeFId,EP1.t_ebuy_product_type_for_enter_f_id as EP1tEbuyProductTypeForEnterFId,EP1.t_ebuy_delivery_desc_id as EP1tEbuyDeliveryDescId,EP1.f_price_unit as EP1priceUnit,EP1.f_code as EP1code,EP1.f_erp_code as EP1erpCode,EP1.f_specification as EP1specification,EP1.f_desc as EP1desc,EP1.f_status as EP1status,EP1.f_status_audit as EP1statusAudit,date_format(EP1.f_up_shelf_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EP1upShelfTime,date_format(EP1.f_down_shelf_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EP1downShelfTime,EP1.f_pic_special as EP1picSpecial,EP1.f_price_point as EP1pricePoint,EP1.f_price_discount_point as EP1priceDiscountPoint,EP1.f_point_type as EP1pointType,EP1.f_wlApp_type as EP1wlappType,EP1.f_special_product_type as EP1specialProductType,EP1.f_application_rang as EP1applicationRang,date_format(EP1.f_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EP1endTime,EP1.f_convert_process as EP1convertProcess,EP1.f_attention_info as EP1attentionInfo,EP1.f_film_ticket_num as EP1filmTicketNum,EP1.t_source_of_supply_f_id as EP1tSourceOfSupplyFId,EP1.f_is_hot_sale as EP1isHotSale,date_format(EP1.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EP1sys0UpdTime

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_ebuy_product ,f_src_id=#{srcId} ,t_supply_merchant_f_id=#{tSupplyMerchantFId} ,f_name=#{name} ,f_name_mini=#{nameMini} ,f_is_pre_sell=#{isPreSell} ,f_price=#{price} ,f_price_discount=#{priceDiscount} ,f_purchase_price=#{purchasePrice} ,f_default_delivery_id=#{defaultDeliveryId} ,f_left_count=#{leftCount} ,f_create_time=str_to_date(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sel_num=#{selNum} ,f_pic_base=#{picBase} ,f_pic_base_mini=#{picBaseMini} ,t_ebuy_product_type_f_id=#{tEbuyProductTypeFId} ,t_ebuy_product_type_for_enter_f_id=#{tEbuyProductTypeForEnterFId} ,t_ebuy_delivery_desc_id=#{tEbuyDeliveryDescId} ,f_price_unit=#{priceUnit} ,f_code=#{code} ,f_erp_code=#{erpCode} ,f_specification=#{specification} ,f_desc=#{desc} ,f_status=#{status} ,f_status_audit=#{statusAudit} ,f_up_shelf_time=str_to_date(#{upShelfTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_down_shelf_time=str_to_date(#{downShelfTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_pic_special=#{picSpecial} ,f_price_point=#{pricePoint} ,f_price_discount_point=#{priceDiscountPoint} ,f_point_type=#{pointType} ,f_wlApp_type=#{wlappType} ,f_special_product_type=#{specialProductType} ,f_application_rang=#{applicationRang} ,f_end_time=str_to_date(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_convert_process=#{convertProcess} ,f_attention_info=#{attentionInfo} ,f_film_ticket_num=#{filmTicketNum} ,t_source_of_supply_f_id=#{tSourceOfSupplyFId} ,f_is_hot_sale=#{isHotSale} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_ebuy_product ,f_src_id=#{item.srcId} ,t_supply_merchant_f_id=#{item.tSupplyMerchantFId} ,f_name=#{item.name} ,f_name_mini=#{item.nameMini} ,f_is_pre_sell=#{item.isPreSell} ,f_price=#{item.price} ,f_price_discount=#{item.priceDiscount} ,f_purchase_price=#{item.purchasePrice} ,f_default_delivery_id=#{item.defaultDeliveryId} ,f_left_count=#{item.leftCount} ,f_create_time=str_to_date(#{item.createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sel_num=#{item.selNum} ,f_pic_base=#{item.picBase} ,f_pic_base_mini=#{item.picBaseMini} ,t_ebuy_product_type_f_id=#{item.tEbuyProductTypeFId} ,t_ebuy_product_type_for_enter_f_id=#{item.tEbuyProductTypeForEnterFId} ,t_ebuy_delivery_desc_id=#{item.tEbuyDeliveryDescId} ,f_price_unit=#{item.priceUnit} ,f_code=#{item.code} ,f_erp_code=#{item.erpCode} ,f_specification=#{item.specification} ,f_desc=#{item.desc} ,f_status=#{item.status} ,f_status_audit=#{item.statusAudit} ,f_up_shelf_time=str_to_date(#{item.upShelfTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_down_shelf_time=str_to_date(#{item.downShelfTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_pic_special=#{item.picSpecial} ,f_price_point=#{item.pricePoint} ,f_price_discount_point=#{item.priceDiscountPoint} ,f_point_type=#{item.pointType} ,f_wlApp_type=#{item.wlappType} ,f_special_product_type=#{item.specialProductType} ,f_application_rang=#{item.applicationRang} ,f_end_time=str_to_date(#{item.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_convert_process=#{item.convertProcess} ,f_attention_info=#{item.attentionInfo} ,f_film_ticket_num=#{item.filmTicketNum} ,t_source_of_supply_f_id=#{item.tSourceOfSupplyFId} ,f_is_hot_sale=#{item.isHotSale} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_ebuy_product WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
#{item}
